content.question: Which of the following best explains why an error occurs when the classes are compiled?

choices.label: The compare method cannot have parameters of type Measurement.
The compare method should be declared as void.
The toInches method cannot be accessed from a class other than Measurement.
The variables feet and inches cannot be accessed from the method toInches.

content.answer: The toInches method cannot be accessed from a class other than Measurement.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
